    • Uses of Coupon in dbdao

      Methods in dbdao that return Coupon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Coupon CouponDBDAO.getCoupon(java.lang.String id)
      The method gets the Coupon object from the database record by Coupon ID.
      Methods in dbdao that return types with arguments of type Coupon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Coupon> CouponDBDAO.getAllCoupons()
      The method gets the list of all active coupons from the database.
      java.util.Set<Coupon> CouponDBDAO.getCouponByDate(java.sql.Date date, java.lang.String compId)
      This method gets all the Coupons released by specific Company that will end before definite date.
      java.util.Set<Coupon> CouponDBDAO.getCouponByPrice(double price, ClientType clientType, java.lang.String clientId)
      The method gets the list of all active coupons under the definite price from the database that were released by specific Company or were purchased by specific Client.
      java.util.Set<Coupon> CouponDBDAO.getCouponByType(CouponType type, ClientType clientType, java.lang.String clientId)
      The method gets the list of all active coupons by coupon type from the database that were released by specific Company or were purchased by specific Client.
      java.util.Set<Coupon> CustomerDBDAO.getCoupons(java.lang.String id)
      The method gets the set of coupons (active and inactive) purchased by Customer (by Customer's id).
      java.util.Set<Coupon> CompanyDBDAO.getCoupons(java.lang.String id)
      The method gets the set of active coupons released by Company (by Company's id).
      Methods in dbdao with parameters of type Coupon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean CouponDBDAO.allowedToPurchase(Coupon coupon, java.lang.String custId)
      The method checks if Customer may purchase specific Coupon.
      void CouponDBDAO.createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      The method converts a Coupon object into a database record.
      boolean CouponDBDAO.enoughCouponsToPurchase(Coupon coupon)
      The method checks if there are coupons to purchase in specific deal and if the deal is active.
      void CouponDBDAO.joinCouponCompany(Coupon coupon, java.lang.String compId)
      This method links the Coupon to the specific Company.
      void CouponDBDAO.joinCouponCustomer(Coupon coupon, java.lang.String custId)
      This method links the Coupon to the specific Customer.
      boolean CouponDBDAO.releasedByCompany(Coupon coupon, java.lang.String compId)
      This auxiliary method returns if the Coupon released by specific Company.
      void CouponDBDAO.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      The method doesn't remove the Coupon from the database but sets the state of the Coupon and records in the join tables (customer_coupon, company_coupon) as inactive (false) in order to keep a history of actions.
      void CouponDBDAO.updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      The method updates Coupon's data in the database according to changes that were made in the Coupon object.

      The method gets all active coupons by type.

      This method gets all the Coupons released by specific Company that will end before definite date.
      java.util.Set<Coupon> CouponClientFacadeSuperClass.getCouponsByPrice(double price) 
      java.util.Set<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCouponsByPrice(double price)
      This method gets all Coupons released by Company under the definite price.
      java.util.Set<Coupon> CouponClientFacadeSuperClass.getCouponsByType(CouponType type) 
      java.util.Set<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCouponsByType(CouponType type)
      This method gets all Coupons released by Company by Coupon type.
      Methods in facades with parameters of type Coupon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CouponClientFacadeSuperClass.createCoupon(Coupon coupon) 
      void CompanyFacade.createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      The method converts a Coupon object into a database record and links it to the specific Company.
      void CustomerFacade.purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      This method allow to Customer to purchase the Coupon.
      void CouponClientFacadeSuperClass.purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon) 
      void CouponClientFacadeSuperClass.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon) 
      void CompanyFacade.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      This method checks if the Coupon released by the Company that manages the account and removes the Coupon if the Coupon belongs to the Company.
      void CouponClientFacadeSuperClass.updateCoupon(Coupon coupon) 
      void CompanyFacade.updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      This method checks if the Coupon released by the Company that manages the account and updates the end date and the price of the Coupon if the Coupon belongs to the Company.
